text: Juan Taverna (13 April 1948 â€“ 7 November 2014)Ex-Argentine footballer Juan Taverna, an idol at Banfield, passes away was an Argentine former footballer. From 1968 to 1971, he played for Estudiantes de La Plata. From 1973 to 1974, he played for Real Murcia. And for a few months in 1976, he played for Boca Juniors as a forward scoring only 3 goals. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Argentine footballers Category:Sportspeople from Buenos Aires
title: Juan Taverna
